title: Pc Over Heating and then getting warnings and low priory queus
body: I'm sorry riot I didn't do anything, my pc keeps over heating, I use a fan under neath etc and it doesn't work, I feel like I'm endangered to being banned for over heating ;(

replies.body:
Well, if the overheating of your computer is causing you to disconnect from games, then that's still leaving games. After all, overheating will just cause your computer to turn off. There's no way for the game to know that's what happened.

You should find a better way to ventilate your machine before continuing to play games. Have you tried using a stronger fan at a different angle? Do you have a room that has cold air-conditioning that you can play in?
